Text:
It happened the same night that Rose and I arrived
in the Sacred Land of Lindwurm...

She invited me to join her, and we ended up renting
rooms in the same hotel.

I declined at first, but she was so persistent that
I gave in...so here I am. Well, I guess freeloading
off a rich girl is another life experience.

At least we have separate rooms. If rumors got out,
my perfect side character existence would be in
danger. I've gotta keep my distance from the main
characters.
Here we go—
Finally, I'm alone.

I crack open the hotel room window and slide out
into the night. Time to resume being a tourist.

(I mean, I could have walked out the main entrance,
but just in case something happens I don't wanna be
seen.)

(I'm still not familiar with this place, and it
doesn't seem very...safe.)

(Since Rose is off rubbing elbows with the elite,
now's my chance.)

(If she knew I was going around the city at night,
she'd probably insist on joining me. Gotta avoid
that.)

(I think she's involved in some weird religion,
so it'd be a mess if she thinks I ran off or
something.)

I guess I shouldn't be gone too long. But I wanna
see that view up close and personal...
The cliff I saw this afternoon—
Wonder why they're all left arms...

This land is said to be where the hero Olivier
severed the left arm of the vile Diablos.

Within the surface of the steep mountains are some
ruins called the Sanctuary, where Diablos' left arm
is supposedly sealed away.
Huh. Guess that explains the swords and arms.

(Sanctuary... Sounds like something I should
check out...)

(But, I bet civilians aren't allowed to enter.
Especially at this time of night...)
(Let's just see how far I can get.)

(I want to enjoy being a tourist, as a side
character. Relax and take it easy.)
(So, sprinting away at full speed would be...)

Whoa, what a view! Guess you'd want to build a
sacred city in a place like this.

Of course, I've seen all sorts of views like this.
As a shadowbroker, I'm always up somewhere
high.
But still, I'm moved everytime I see them.

Each one has its own uniqueness. Plus... I'm a side
character right now.

I wanna do the kind of touristy things side characters
do. If only there were cameras or smart phones in this
world, I'd be taking selfies everywhere.

Maybe I should write "Shadow was here" on that
pillar... No, that would be bad behavior...

I descend the stairs as I'm thinking this, until
something blocks my path.

It's a bit late for tourists, kid. It's dangerous
out there.

...Two of them. It looks like they followed me until
I was somewhere secluded instead of lying in wait.

(Cid Kagenou. Born into the Kagenou family, he's the
kid with his eyes on Rose Oriana...)

(If we threaten an' hurt 'im good, we can use 'im as
a pawn within th'Dark Knight Academy.)

(If we do, then Duke Perv'll think highly of us...
If we break a couple'a his fingers, he'll prolly do
as we say.)
Huh?! Wh-Why...?!

I play along and make my voice shake as I eye them.
I can tell they're used to using their fists to get what
they want.

They probably make a living beating up random
tourists for their money.

I like being a side character, but attracting thugs
like this is a pain.
We just wanna have a little chat, that's all.

(They're just gonna ask to borrow money, I bet. Like
they'd pay it back.)

Nobody's gonna come and save you this late at night,
even if you cry for help! Hehe!
N-No! Let me go!

(Nobody will come, huh... So I can do whatever I
want to, right?)
I flip the switch inside my head to "on."
What the...? The air around him changed?!
You noticed? You're sharper than you look!
Too bad they didn't realize it sooner.
Aaaaggghhhh! M-My jaw...!!!
Aghhh—!!

(First, I break the middle guy's jaw and knock him
over, then take out the guy next to him...)
Aaaaaagh!!!

They fall away from the stairs and tumble down the
side of the cliff. It's an avalanche of thugs.
I doubt they survived that fall...

I've always wanted to say something like that.
It's more of a powerful character move than a
side character one, though.
I head off to the hot spring in high spirits.

If a main character falls off a cliff they're
probably fine, but there's no such luck
for guys like that.

Where did you go?! I have been searching all over
for you!

After leisurely enjoying myself in the hot spring,
I return to find an extremly angry Rose.

Oh, sorry, I had diarrhea so I locked myself in the
bathroom for an hour...

I thought an hour would be enough time, but it looks
like she came back early so I wouldn't be alone.
No relaxation time for me.

As Rose berates me, I decide that no matter what,
I'll get my tourism in tomorrow.
